Chi-Yu (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #1003: Ting-Lu
Pokémon
#1005: Roaring Moon →

Chi-Yu has been featured on 4 different cards since it debuted in the Paldea Evolved expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Chi-Yu cards are normally Fire-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Chi-Yu

Chi-Yu
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Chi-Yu Paradox Rift 029/182 Ancient Roar 016/066
SVP Black Star Promos   057 Terastal Fest ex   025/187
Chi-Yu Twilight Masquerade 039/167 Crimson Haze 018/066
Chi-Yu         Mega Symphonia 014/063
Chi-Yu
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Chi-Yu Paldea Evolved 040/193 Clay Burst 016/071
Paldea Evolved 234/193 Clay Burst 085/071
Paldea Evolved 259/193 Clay Burst 092/071
        Shiny Treasure ex 035/190
Paldean Fates 241/091 Shiny Treasure ex 356/190
